name: Noelle Roselyn AIPPERSPACH, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Mahir S. Al-Hakim, Deceased, petitioner, v. Patrick McINERNEY, in His Official Capacity as Board President, Kansas City Board of Police Commissioners, et al.

opinions.text: Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
